Posts.Content: Jan 16, 2010 01:36PM musicalmaven wrote: Hang in there and try as hard as you can not to dwell on the cancer. Take a walk if you're up to it or go out with friends/family. As Job once said, "For there exists hope for even a tree, if it gets cut down, it will even sprout again, and its own twig will not cease to be." There is always hope...never forget that and you'll come off the winner!
Posts.Title: Progression in liver and bones :-( konakat dreamwriter
